name: FPS Playground (Delthor Games)
description:
This is the first project I specifically made for my portfolio.  As such, it is focused on code and the gameplay loop only extends so far. If you want a more interesting game, you can check out the rest of my profile here on itch.io.

This project is conceived as a tool for game designers who want to practice map design for competitive shooter games. Users can create and edit maps and test their design ideas by simulating a match with complex soldier AI.
